alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Fulton (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 5:03PM EDT until July 24 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Franklin County in south central Pennsylvania... Southeastern Fulton County in south central Pennsylvania... * Until 600 PM EDT. * At 503 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Big Cove Tannery, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mercersburg, McConnellsburg, Fort Loudon, Big Cove Tannery, Claylick, Williamson, Upton and Whitetail Ski Area. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
